sqlMap.select: select WE_ID, WE_COMPANY_NAME, WE_PHONE, WE_ADDRESS, WE_ENTERPRISE_NATURE, WE_STAFF_SIZE, WE_ENTRY_TIME, WE_LEAVE_TIME, WE_TOP_POSITION, WE_TOP_POSITION_DEPARTMENT, WE_TOP_POSITION_WORK_TIME, WE_JURISDICTION_TEAM_SIZE, WE_LAST_BASIC_SALARY_RANGE, WE_LAST_EFFECTS_SALARY_RANGE, WE_DIMISSION_REASON, WE_FUNCTION_DESCRIBE, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_POSITION, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_NAME_CONTACT, WE_LATERAL_REFERENCE_POSITION, WE_LATERAL_REFER_NAME_CONTACT, II_ID from B_WORK_EXPERIENCE where WE_ID = #weId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, c.* from ( select WE_ID, WE_COMPANY_NAME, WE_PHONE, WE_ADDRESS, WE_ENTERPRISE_NATURE, WE_STAFF_SIZE, WE_ENTRY_TIME, WE_LEAVE_TIME, WE_TOP_POSITION, WE_TOP_POSITION_DEPARTMENT, WE_TOP_POSITION_WORK_TIME, WE_JURISDICTION_TEAM_SIZE, WE_LAST_BASIC_SALARY_RANGE, WE_LAST_EFFECTS_SALARY_RANGE, WE_DIMISSION_REASON, WE_FUNCTION_DESCRIBE, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_POSITION, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_NAME_CONTACT, WE_LATERAL_REFERENCE_POSITION, WE_LATERAL_REFER_NAME_CONTACT, II_ID from B_WORK_EXPERIENCE ) c) WHERE NUMROW >= $ibegin$ AND NUMROW < $iend$

SELECT count(1) as ID from ( select WE_ID, WE_COMPANY_NAME, WE_PHONE, WE_ADDRESS, WE_ENTERPRISE_NATURE, WE_STAFF_SIZE, WE_ENTRY_TIME, WE_LEAVE_TIME, WE_TOP_POSITION, WE_TOP_POSITION_DEPARTMENT, WE_TOP_POSITION_WORK_TIME, WE_JURISDICTION_TEAM_SIZE, WE_LAST_BASIC_SALARY_RANGE, WE_LAST_EFFECTS_SALARY_RANGE, WE_DIMISSION_REASON, WE_FUNCTION_DESCRIBE, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_POSITION, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_NAME_CONTACT, WE_LATERAL_REFERENCE_POSITION, WE_LATERAL_REFER_NAME_CONTACT, II_ID from B_WORK_EXPERIENCE )
sqlMap.insert: insert into B_WORK_EXPERIENCE (WE_ID, WE_COMPANY_NAME, WE_PHONE, WE_ADDRESS, WE_ENTERPRISE_NATURE, WE_STAFF_SIZE, WE_ENTRY_TIME, WE_LEAVE_TIME, WE_TOP_POSITION, WE_TOP_POSITION_DEPARTMENT, WE_TOP_POSITION_WORK_TIME, WE_JURISDICTION_TEAM_SIZE, WE_LAST_BASIC_SALARY_RANGE, WE_LAST_EFFECTS_SALARY_RANGE, WE_DIMISSION_REASON, WE_FUNCTION_DESCRIBE, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_POSITION, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_NAME_CONTACT, WE_LATERAL_REFERENCE_POSITION, WE_LATERAL_REFER_NAME_CONTACT, II_ID) values (#weId#, #weCompanyName#, #wePhone#, #weAddress#, #weEnterpriseNature#, #weStaffSize#, #weEntryTime#, #weLeaveTime#, #weTopPosition#, #weTopPositionDepartment#, #weTopPositionWorkTime#, #weJurisdictionTeamSize#, #weLastBasicSalaryRange#, #weLastEffectsSalaryRange#, #weDimissionReason#, #weFunctionDescribe#, #weDirectLeaderPosition#, #weDirectLeaderNameContact#, #weLateralReferencePosition#, #weLateralReferNameContact#, #iiId#)
sqlMap.update: update B_WORK_EXPERIENCE set WE_COMPANY_NAME = #weCompanyName#, WE_PHONE = #wePhone#, WE_ADDRESS = #weAddress#, WE_ENTERPRISE_NATURE = #weEnterpriseNature#, WE_STAFF_SIZE = #weStaffSize#, WE_ENTRY_TIME = #weEntryTime#, WE_LEAVE_TIME = #weLeaveTime#, WE_TOP_POSITION = #weTopPosition#, WE_TOP_POSITION_DEPARTMENT = #weTopPositionDepartment#, WE_TOP_POSITION_WORK_TIME = #weTopPositionWorkTime#, WE_JURISDICTION_TEAM_SIZE = #weJurisdictionTeamSize#, WE_LAST_BASIC_SALARY_RANGE = #weLastBasicSalaryRange#, WE_LAST_EFFECTS_SALARY_RANGE = #weLastEffectsSalaryRange#, WE_DIMISSION_REASON = #weDimissionReason#, WE_FUNCTION_DESCRIBE = #weFunctionDescribe#, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_POSITION = #weDirectLeaderPosition#, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_NAME_CONTACT = #weDirectLeaderNameContact#, WE_LATERAL_REFERENCE_POSITION = #weLateralReferencePosition#, WE_LATERAL_REFER_NAME_CONTACT = #weLateralReferNameContact#, II_ID = #iiId# where WE_ID = #weId#
sqlMap.select:
select WE_ID, WE_COMPANY_NAME, WE_PHONE, WE_ADDRESS, WE_ENTERPRISE_NATURE, WE_STAFF_SIZE, WE_ENTRY_TIME, WE_LEAVE_TIME, WE_TOP_POSITION, WE_TOP_POSITION_DEPARTMENT, WE_TOP_POSITION_WORK_TIME, WE_JURISDICTION_TEAM_SIZE, WE_LAST_BASIC_SALARY_RANGE, WE_LAST_EFFECTS_SALARY_RANGE, WE_DIMISSION_REASON, WE_FUNCTION_DESCRIBE, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_POSITION, WE_DIRECT_LEADER_NAME_CONTACT, WE_LATERAL_REFERENCE_POSITION, WE_LATERAL_REFER_NAME_CONTACT, II_ID from B_WORK_EXPERIENCE where 1=1
II_ID = #iiId#
